# {{lb|fr|papermaking}} a transverse rod (generally copper) which supports [[vergeure]]s in moulds used to manufacture paper by hand.
types.html:
pontuseau m (plural pontuseaux)

  1. (papermaking) a transverse rod (generally copper) which supports vergeures in moulds used to manufacture paper by hand.
trans: a transverse rod  which supports vergeures in moulds used to manufacture paper by hand.

title: pontuseau
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pɔ̃.ty.zo/
